verses.name: Exodus 30:27
verses.text: And the table and all his vessels, and the candlestick and his vessels, and the altar of incense,

verses.name: Exodus 30:28
verses.text: And the altar of burnt offering with all his vessels, and the laver and his foot.

verses.name: Exodus 30:29
verses.text: And thou shalt sanctify them, that they may be most holy: whatsoever toucheth them shall be holy.

verses.name: Exodus 30:30
verses.text: And thou shalt anoint Aaron and his sons, and consecrate them, that they may minister unto me in the priest’s office.

verses.name: Exodus 30:31
verses.text: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, This shall be an holy anointing oil unto me throughout your generations.
